本页面展示团队的新闻，包括科研进展、学术会议和团队动态。


## 科研进展

- [2025-7-9] 祝贺团队成员武丽敏在JCR二区期刊 Journal of Applied Economics 发表论文。论文题目：The impact of green finance on sustainable development: an investigation into national ESG performance| [链接](https://doi.org/10.1080/15140326.2025.2528672)
- [2025-4-15] 祝贺团队指导的本科生周浩在JCR一区期刊 Energy Strategy Reviews 发表论文。论文题目：Does a bank-dominated financial system benefit the development of renewable energy in developing countries? The case of China
- [2025-3-15] 祝贺团队成员张鑫语在中科院一区期刊 Energy 发表论文。论文题目：Digitalization and renewable energy development: Analysis based on cross-country panel data
- [2024-12-30] 祝贺团队指导的本科生牛丙成在中科院一区期刊 Oeconomia Copernicana 发表论文。论文题目：The impact of ICT development on ESG performance: International evidence
- [2024-9-23] 祝贺团队成员祝文慧在JCR一区期刊 Emerging Markets Finance and Trade 发表论文。论文题目：How Does Digital Finance Stimulate Urban Innovation in China? The Perspective of Human Capital and Consumption Upgrading
